name: Hell is a Mountain Flower
description:
Die, die, jump, die - climb the mountain and hunt the demons.

Journey through a sharp, minimalist, ever-changing world - grab hold of crumbling mountainside, swipe higher and higher.

Be broken by the Birds, consumed by the Teeth and digested by the Plants.

Solve the mystery to summon each Demon - show your skill and resolve, and eventually - be free to climb forever.

Through failure our expectations become lower, but our lives become easier.
